desmoj.extensions.experimentation.reflect

Class ReflectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.experimentation.reflect.ReflectionManager

  • public class ReflectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for using the Java Reflection API.

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.Class c,
                                                 java.lang.String methodName,
                                                 java.lang.Class[] params)
                                          throws ReflectException
        Retrieves a method of a given class. If anything goes wrong a ReflectException is thrown. In this implementation only methods declared directly by the given class are found.
        Parameters:
        c - the class
        methodName - name of the method
        params - parameter list of the method
        Returns:
        the method
        Throws:
        ReflectException

      • getMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.Class c,
                                                 java.lang.String methodName)
                                          throws ReflectException
        Retrieves a method of a given class with an empty parameter list. If anything goes wrong a ReflectException is thrown. In this implementation only methods declared directly by the given class are found.
        Parameters:
        c - the class
        methodName - name of the method
        Returns:
        the method
        Throws:
        ReflectException

      • invokeMethod

        public static java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object owner,
                                            java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                            java.lang.Object[] args)
                                     throws ReflectException
        Invokes a method on an object If anything goes wrong a reflect exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        owner - the object to invoke the method on
        method - the method to be invoked
        args - arguments of the method call
        Returns:
        return value of the method call
        Throws:
        ReflectException

      • getConstructor

        public static java.lang.reflect.Constructor getConstructor(java.lang.Class c,
                                                           java.lang.Class[] params)
        Retrieves a constructor from a given class. If anything goes wrong a reflect exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        c - the class
        params - the constructor's parameter list.
        Returns:
        a constructor object

      • invokeConstructor

        public static java.lang.Object invokeConstructor(java.lang.reflect.Constructor c,
                                                 java.lang.Object[] args)
                                          throws ReflectException
        Invokes a constructor. If anything goes wrong a reflect exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        c - the constructor object
        args - the arguments for the constructor invocation
        Returns:
        the object created by the constructor
        Throws:
        ReflectException

      • getField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field getField(java.lang.Class c,
                                               java.lang.String fieldName)
                                        throws ReflectException
        Retrieves a field from a given class. In this implementation only fields declared directly by the given class are found. On errors a reflect exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        c - the class
        fieldName - the field name
        Returns:
        a field object
        Throws:
        ReflectException

      • getValue

        public static java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.Object owner,
                                        java.lang.reflect.Field field)
                                 throws ReflectException
        Returns the value of the given field has in the specified object. On any error a reflect exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        owner - the object who owns the field
        field - the field
        Returns:
        the current field value
        Throws:
        ReflectException

      • setValue

        public static void setValue(java.lang.Object owner,
                            java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                            java.lang.Object value)
                     throws ReflectException
        Sets the value of the given field of the specified object. On errors a reflect exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        owner - the object owning the field
        field - the field
        value - the value to set the field to
        Throws:
        ReflectException
